actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill relating to the dutiable status of fresh, chilled, or frozen cattle meat and fresh, chilled, or frozen meat of goats and sheep (except lambs) and beef prepared in air-tight containers and beef prepared whether fresh chilled or frozen and lamb or mutton prepared or preserved.

summary.text: Removes import duties on fresh, chilled, or frozen cattle meat and fresh, chilled, or frozen meat of goats and sheep (except lambs) and beef prepared in air-tight containers and beef prepared whether fresh, chilled, or frozen and lamb or mutton prepared or preserved.

titles.title: A bill relating to the dutiable status of fresh, chilled, or frozen cattle meat and fresh, chilled, or frozen meat of goats and sheep (except lambs) and beef prepared in air-tight containers and beef prepared whether fresh chilled or frozen and lamb or mutton prepared or preserved.
